translation.en: [man 1] The importance of the story, to me--
translation.zh: 我认为这个故事的重点是

translation.en: it's so American.
translation.zh: 这种事太有美国特色了

translation.en: Everybody came to America for a new life.
translation.zh: 每个人来到美国 都是为了展开新生活

translation.en: John Demjanjuk came here for a new life.
translation.zh: 当年约翰·德米扬鲁克来到美国 就是为了重新开始

translation.en: And several years into it, it was turned upside down.
translation.zh: 几年后 他的人生起了天翻地覆的变化

translation.en: [man 2] John Demjanjuk had a small house.
translation.zh: 约翰·德米扬纽克有一间小房子

translation.en: He had children. He was a family man.
translation.zh: 也有孩子 他是个顾家的男人

translation.en: He fixed the kids' bikes.
translation.zh: 他会为孩子们修理自行车

translation.en: He worked at the Ford plant.
translation.zh: 他在福特汽车工厂上班

translation.en: He was a normal Cleveland guy.
translation.zh: 是个再正常不过的克利夫兰人

translation.en: [man 3] He was living the American dream. He was a good American citizen.
translation.zh: 他怀抱着美国梦 也是个品行良好的美国市民

translation.en: Up until the government came along and said he was Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 直到政府介入 宣称他是“伊凡雷帝”为止

translation.en: [man 4] Ivan the Terrible was one of the cruelest people who ever existed on the planet Earth.
translation.zh: “伊凡雷帝”是历史上最残暴的人

translation.en: [man 5] This was the man who stood outside of the gas chambers with a sword
translation.zh: 这个人 曾经手持一把剑 站在毒气室外

translation.en: and cut off the breasts of Jewish women.
translation.zh: 切下犹太女人的乳房

translation.en: Who pushed children into the gas chambers,
translation.zh: 把小孩们推入毒气室

translation.en: and did so with a relish.
translation.zh: 而且很享受这个过程

translation.en: [woman] Your-- Your mind just wants to-- to put a screen up
translation.zh: 每当你回想起这件事 都想在脑海中

translation.en: in front of what really happened,
translation.zh: 用屏风遮盖住真实发生的场景

translation.en: 'cause you-- you really don't want to know that human beings did that to each other.
translation.zh: 因为我们根本不想知道 人类会这么对待自己的同类

translation.en: [man 6] The man I saw as John Demjanjuk could have been a monster.
translation.zh: 我眼前的约翰·德米扬鲁克 有可能就是个禽兽

translation.en: Or he could have been a victim of wrong identity.
translation.zh: 也有可能是个被混淆误认的受害者

translation.en: [man 6] In my deepest center of fear is that I think he could be anybody.
translation.zh: 我心底深处的那股恐惧感告诉我 恶魔可能就在我们身边

translation.en: You know, it's funny that I'm back over here in this area now
translation.zh: 如今回到这个小区 感觉有点怪怪的

translation.en: because I've moved probably seven, eight times in my life so far,
translation.zh: 我这辈子搬家过七、八次

translation.en: and all very close to the Ukrainian Village.
translation.zh: 住址都非常靠近乌克兰村

translation.en: I keep being brought back here.
translation.zh: 我经常回到这个地方

translation.en: We're comin' down the street now
translation.zh: 我们驶过的这条街

translation.en: where my grandparents have lived for the majority of their life.
translation.zh: 就是我爷爷奶奶 生活了大半辈子的地方

translation.en: This was home to me in more than one way.
translation.zh: 在某些程度上 这是我的老家

translation.en: Seven Hills is a real quiet community.
translation.zh: 七山是个非常安静的小区

translation.en: It's very close-knit.
translation.zh: 居民关系密切

translation.en: When you look at the news stories, you never hear anything bad coming out of Seven Hills.
translation.zh: 新闻从来不曾播报 七山发生过什么不好的事

translation.en: The only reason anybody has ever heard of Seven Hills
translation.zh: 人们认识七山这个地方 只有一个原因

translation.en: would be because of my grandfather's case.
translation.zh: 那就是透过我爷爷的事

translation.en: Charges were filed today against retired Seven Hills autoworker John Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: （1985年8月） 七山退休汽车厂工人 约翰·德米扬鲁克 今日正式被提控

translation.en: The 66-year-old Ukrainian native
translation.zh: 这名66岁、出生在乌克兰的人

translation.en: is accused of being a Nazi death camp guard named Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 被控在纳粹集中营执行看守任务 囚犯称他为“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: [reporter 1] The death camp guard who played a major role in the torture and gas chamber murders
translation.zh: 二战期间 这名纳粹集中营守卫曾主导了

translation.en: of nearly one million Jews during World War II.
translation.zh: 对将近一百万犹太人 在毒气室进行的折磨和杀害

translation.en: [reporter 2] The charges state that Demjanjuk was a notorious executioner
translation.zh: 该控诉指明 德米扬鲁克是纳粹麾下 一名恶名昭彰的刽子手 参与了纳粹

translation.en: in the Nazis' systematic murder of more than six million Jews.
translation.zh: 该控诉指明 德米扬鲁克是纳粹麾下 一名恶名昭彰的刽子手 参与了纳粹 对超过六百万犹太人的 大规模蓄意屠杀

translation.en: He's accused of operating the gas chambers
translation.zh: 他被控在波兰的特雷布林卡集中营 操作毒气室

translation.en: [reporter 3] Demjanjuk denies all charges,
translation.zh: 德米扬鲁克否认所有指控

translation.en: claiming he is not Ivan the Terrible, and it's all a case of mistaken identity.
translation.zh: 表明自己不是“伊凡雷帝” 坚称执法机构搞错了诉讼对象

translation.en: [Ed Jr.] It was a zoo.
translation.zh: 满街都是来观看的人

translation.en: There were news crews, vehicles parked halfway down the street.
translation.zh: 街道旁挤满了媒体记者 泊满了车

translation.en: Especially here in Cleveland,
translation.zh: 尤其这里是克利夫兰

translation.en: to have somebody that they can portray as this monster,
translation.zh: 突然出了一个被形容成“禽兽”的人

translation.en: and as this, you know, villain.
translation.zh: 也就是大家所谓的“坏人”

translation.en: [reporter 1] The man many consider as Ivan the Terrible faces deportation...
translation.zh: 被很多人当作是“伊凡雷帝”的 德米扬鲁克 将面临被驱逐出境的…

translation.en: [Ed Jr.] You turn the TV on, and five out of six news channels
translation.zh: 打开电视 六个频道中 就有五个频道

translation.en: were reporting about my grandfather.
translation.zh: 报导我爷爷的新闻

translation.en: [reporter 2] All camera lenses are trained on this house.
translation.zh: 所有摄影镜头都聚焦在这间房子上

translation.en: There's a Do Not Disturb sign on the door.
translation.zh: 门前挂着一个写着“切勿打扰”的牌子

translation.en: [Ed Jr.] He used to have 30, 40 people with signs standing right here, where we are right now.
translation.zh: 当时有30、40人站在这边举着牌子

translation.en: [Ed Jr.] People protesting that he's here...
translation.zh: 他们抗议我爷爷留下来

translation.en: weren't too happy that he was.
translation.zh: 他们不满意他留在这边

translation.en: Demjanjuk insists it is a case of mistaken identity.
translation.zh: 德米扬鲁克坚称 执法机构搞错了对象

translation.en: A Treblinka survivor today insisted... there was no mistake.
translation.zh: 但一名特雷布林卡集中营幸存者 今日坚称 他就是本人

translation.en: [interpreter] There has not been a single moment, not today or yesterday,
translation.zh: 无论是今天、昨天 一年前 甚至20年前

translation.en: -[speaking Hebrew] -not a year ago or 20 years ago, when this man hasn't been in my mind.
translation.zh: 每时每刻 这个人从来不曾在我记忆中消失

translation.en: He's there constantly.
translation.zh: 挥之不去

translation.en: [interviewer] Those witnesses testified that you herded the Jews
translation.zh: 证人供证时表示 你就是将犹太人送入毒气室的守卫

translation.en: into the gas chamber.
translation.zh: 你就是将犹太人送入毒气室的守卫

translation.en: Why would they say that?
translation.zh: 你认为他们为什么这么说？

translation.en: I really don't know why they give that evidence.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道他们为什么供证…

translation.en: But why they give that evidence now?
translation.zh: 为什么现在才来供证？

translation.en: Why didn't give that evidence in '45, when the war was ended?
translation.zh: 为什么不在1945年战争结束后供证？

translation.en: [interviewer] Were you ever a guard
translation.zh: 你是否曾为纳粹党卫队效力 在集中营担任守卫？

translation.en: -in an SS Nazi extermination camp? -Never. Never. Never.
translation.zh: 你是否曾为纳粹党卫队效力 在集中营担任守卫？ 不曾

translation.en: [newscaster] What we are looking at is a case
translation.zh: 这起诉讼案

translation.en: which may be unprecedented in international scope.
translation.zh: 受到全球媒体的广泛关注 堪称史无前例

translation.en: A naturalized American charged with war crimes in a 28-page indictment.
translation.zh: 一名美国移民面临战犯罪名 起诉书长达整整28页

translation.en: It is the biggest case since Adolf Eichmann was convicted
translation.zh: 这是自阿道夫·艾希曼于1962年 被判刑以来 最轰动的战犯诉讼案

translation.en: back in 1962, and it may well be the last war crimes case
translation.zh: 这是自阿道夫·艾希曼于1962年 被判刑以来 最轰动的战犯诉讼案 也很可能是以犹太人大屠杀战犯名义 接受审判的最后一人

translation.en: to come out of the Holocaust.
translation.zh: 也很可能是以犹太人大屠杀战犯名义 接受审判的最后一人

translation.en: [man] Ford was a place that, if you stayed a week,
translation.zh: 福特这个公司 只要你能待上一个星期

translation.en: you knew you were gonna stay the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 就会待上一辈子

translation.en: It was family.
translation.zh: 这里宛如一个大家庭

translation.en: The people that came to work at Ford
translation.zh: 福特公司的职员

translation.en: from Germany, the Ukraine,
translation.zh: 有些来自德国和乌克兰

translation.en: -they did their job, hardly ever talked... -[flames roar]
translation.zh: 他们尽忠职守 很少说话

translation.en: ...then they disappeared into the darkness.
translation.zh: 然后消失在黑暗中

translation.en: The work was incredibly hard.
translation.zh: 工作非常艰难

translation.en: It was hot, it was noisy beyond comprehension.
translation.zh: 环境炽热 噪音大得无法想象

translation.en: But if you made it past one or two weeks...
translation.zh: 通常只要能熬过首一、两个星期 （德米扬鲁克在福特公司 上班期间的主管 盖瑞·霍洛纳克）

translation.en: that was it. They never left.
translation.zh: 职员就不会再离开了

translation.en: The one thing I remember, when the noise about what John might have been, you know, came about,
translation.zh: 记得当约翰可能是纳粹战犯的消息 传开来后

translation.en: that's all anybody talked about.
translation.zh: 大家都在议论纷纷

translation.en: The shit hit the fan.
translation.zh: 一发不可收拾

translation.en: Everybody was talking about it,
translation.zh: 大家谈论不休

translation.en: and you never heard someone say something bad... about John.
translation.zh: 但没有人说约翰是坏人

translation.en: Everybody that worked at Ford was that way.
translation.zh: 每个在福特公司上班的人 都是那副德行

translation.en: [man] I think a lot of people in Cleveland saw themselves in John Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: 我相信很多克利夫兰人都可以 从约翰·德米扬鲁克身上 找到自己的缩影

translation.en: Someone who came to this country and got married and worked hard.
translation.zh: 就是一个移民美国 在这边成家立室 并且努力工作的人

translation.en: And here was the government coming in and grabbing him by the scruff of the neck
translation.zh: 突然政府官员出现 抓住他的后颈

translation.en: and hauling him into court, take-- trying to take away his citizenship,
translation.zh: 把他押上法庭 企图剥夺他的公民身份

translation.en: and that-- that scared them. That scared them.
translation.zh: 这件事吓坏了克利夫兰人

translation.en: [Holodnak] But...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: a sociopath can live among you...
translation.zh: 有时候 杀人狂就生活在我们周围

translation.en: your whole life, and you don't know it till he eats you.
translation.zh: 我们这辈子浑然不知 直到他对你下毒手

translation.en: [man] I've spent my career working at the Office of Special Investigations.
translation.zh: 我有大半辈子 都在特别调查办公室工作

translation.en: The so-called "Nazi Hunting Unit."
translation.zh: 我们也被称为“纳粹战犯追查小组”

translation.en: The Demjanjuk case is traceable
translation.zh: 德米扬鲁克案并非无迹可寻

translation.en: to a list of war criminals in the United States.
translation.zh: 美国政府掌握了一份战犯名单

translation.en: Survivor witnesses pointed to Demjanjuk's photo and said, "We remember him."
translation.zh: 幸存者们指着德米扬鲁克的照片说： “我们记得他”

translation.en: He was the guard they knew at Treblinka.
translation.zh: 他曾是特雷布林卡集中营的守卫

translation.en: The gas chamber operator, Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 负责操作毒气室 绰号叫“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: No decent government could just stand by
translation.zh: 任何一个有良知的政府 都不会束手旁观

translation.en: and say, "Well, that was then, and this is now." No.
translation.zh: 然后说：“往事不可谏 来者犹可追” 这是不可能的

translation.en: He had to be removed from the United States.
translation.zh: 他必须被逐出美国

translation.en: Ivan the Terrible was... one of the cruelest people who ever existed on the planet Earth.
translation.zh: “伊凡雷帝”是历史上最残暴的一个人

translation.en: One point seven million Jews were annihilated in Poland,
translation.zh: 有将近170万犹太人在波兰被残杀

translation.en: and Ivan the Terrible... did the dirty work.
translation.zh: “伊凡雷帝”便是负责执行 这种肮脏任务的人

translation.en: Someone who delighted in herding men,
translation.zh: 这种人以将男人、女人、孩童和婴儿

translation.en: women, children, and babies into a gas chamber.
translation.zh: 送入毒气室为乐

translation.en: Who delighted in using a blade, I think a sword even,
translation.zh: 以使用利刃或剑

translation.en: to, um, torture people, um, in their final moments.
translation.zh: 折磨濒临死亡的人为乐

translation.en: The horror of it.
translation.zh: 这种暴力所带来的恐惧

translation.en: The despair of it.
translation.zh: 绝望

translation.en: The cruelty of it is... is so... overwhelming.
translation.zh: 以及残暴 令人不忍卒睹

translation.en: One has to... has to struggle not to think about it all the time.
translation.zh: 我们必须极力不去想象当时的画面

translation.en: [man] The United States had no jurisdiction over John Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: 美国无权通过司法程序审判 约翰·德米扬鲁克

translation.en: He didn't commit the crime in an American territory,
translation.zh: 毕竟他不曾在美国境内犯罪

translation.en: and he didn't commit the crime against Americans.
translation.zh: 也不曾伤害过美国人

translation.en: There's only one way that you can get a former Nazi hiding in America.
translation.zh: 对付藏在美国境内的前纳粹分子 只有一个方法

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -[Rashke] He can be deported.
translation.zh: 那就是将他遣返回国

translation.en: [reporter] Demjanjuk, already stripped of his citizenship
translation.zh: 失去美国公民身份

translation.en: and facing deportation proceedings, is under a new threat.
translation.zh: 被驱逐出境的德米扬鲁克 即将面临新一轮挑战

translation.en: For in the most ominous development of all, the Israeli government is seeking
translation.zh: 以色列政府以战犯名义 要求将其引渡 这也是自案情爆发后

translation.en: his extradition as a war criminal.
translation.zh: 当事人所面临的最不利情况

translation.en: [in Hebrew] At the district court in Jerusalem, an indictment was served today against John Demjanjuk,
translation.zh: 耶路撒冷县法院今日收到 控诉约翰·德米扬鲁克的起诉书

translation.en: suspected of being Ivan the Terrible, the murderer of Treblinka.
translation.zh: 嫌犯被怀疑是曾在特雷布林卡集中营 谋杀百姓的“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: [in English] He feels bad that we have to be out here.
translation.zh: 他对我们需要抛头露面这种事 感到难过

translation.en: That, you know...
translation.zh: （德米扬鲁克的女儿 莉迪亚·德米扬鲁克）

translation.en: Everything that's going on, to the family,
translation.zh: 这个家所发生的一切

translation.en: it... it hurts him.
translation.zh: 令他感到非常难过

translation.en: But we're gonna fully support him
translation.zh: 不过我们会全力支持他

translation.en: because we care and we believe in what he's doing,
translation.zh: 因为我们在乎他 也相信他的作为

translation.en: and we'll back him up all the way.
translation.zh: 我们会全力支持他

translation.en: [man] I have nothing but bottomless sympathy and feelings for the Demjanjuk family.
translation.zh: 我对德米扬鲁克的家人 只有深深的同情

translation.en: They-- They felt it to their core that their father was innocent,
translation.zh: 他们打从心底相信 爸爸是无辜的

translation.en: and they did everything in their power, I believe.
translation.zh: 他们竭尽所能地帮助他

translation.en: I think they made a lot of mistakes, but who wouldn't?
translation.zh: 他们做了许多错误的决定 但谁能无过呢？

translation.en: It's such a new role for anybody to take on.
translation.zh: 毕竟没有人能适应 角色的突然转变

translation.en: [man] We know exactly the kind of person Ivan the Terrible is,
translation.zh: 我们知道那个“伊凡雷帝” 究竟是什么样的人

translation.en: and that person is definitely not my father.
translation.zh: 那个人绝对不是我父亲

translation.en: He's an innocent man.
translation.zh: 我父亲是无辜的

translation.en: They arrested an innocent man. Now they put an innocent man in jail.
translation.zh: 他们逮捕了一个无辜的人 如今要把他送入监狱

translation.en: We've got all kinds of information. They don't want to hear it.
translation.zh: 我们掌握了各式各样的资料 但他们都不想听

translation.en: They don't even want it to go to court. They want to get him out of here,
translation.zh: 不想让这些资料在法庭上公开 只是一味地想将他驱逐出境

translation.en: and they want to keep the medias confused about it and get him out of here.
translation.zh: 不断误导媒体 以便将他驱逐出境

translation.en: [man] Lydia Demjanjuk gave me a call.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚·德米雷鲁克给我打了电话

translation.en: At that point in time, I didn't have any idea...
translation.zh: 那一刻 我对整件事… （德米扬鲁克的辩护律师 马克·奥康诺）

translation.en: uh, what the story was,
translation.zh: …毫无头绪

translation.en: or whether I wanted to get involved with anything.
translation.zh: 也不清楚我要不要参与

translation.en: I had a conversation with my dad. He said, "Go there, see what you think."
translation.zh: 我跟我爸谈起这件事 他说：“去看看 再决定”

translation.en: So finally, I got there,
translation.zh: 于是我去拜访他们家

translation.en: and greeted John, who's on the front lawn, and he's doin' stuff.
translation.zh: 我和正在前院搞园艺的约翰 打了招呼

translation.en: And all his flowers everywhere. Beautiful, green flowers everywhere.
translation.zh: 院子里到处都是花草 绿意盎然 百花盛开

translation.en: I said, "Ivan the Terrible doin' all this flower stuff?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“‘伊凡雷帝’ 居然在栽花弄草”

translation.en: [O'Connor] He was the perfect immigrant. Ukrainian immigrant,
translation.zh: 他是个完美的乌克兰移民

translation.en: in the Ukrainian community, going to the Ukrainian church.
translation.zh: 活跃于乌克兰社群 是乌克兰教会的常客

translation.en: He was a great worker at the Ford plant.
translation.zh: 也是福特汽车工厂的优秀职员

translation.en: Never had a fight, never been arrested, never got a speeding ticket.
translation.zh: 不曾与人起冲突 没有犯罪前科 也未曾收到过超速罚单

translation.en: And I'm thinking, "Okay, maybe he's hiding something.
translation.zh: 我心想：“也许他有所隐瞒

translation.en: Maybe he's the best actor on the planet."
translation.zh: 也许他是世界上最出色的演员”

translation.en: I saw all the allegations.
translation.zh: 我看过了所有的控诉

translation.en: I'm thinking... "How is this possible for a human being to do that?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“一个人怎么可能 做出如此丧尽天良的事？”

translation.en: You've got that image, and it's very strong.
translation.zh: 那个画面历历在目

translation.en: It goes into your heart, it goes down into your guts.

translation.zh: 我就收到丹尼斯·高德曼 送来的一个箱子

translation.zh: 美籍法律顾问马克·奥康诺 今天抵达以色列

translation.zh: -换句话说 就是制造麻烦的人 -你以身为这种人为乐？

translation.zh: 我不需要努力成为这种人

translation.zh: 当了辩护律师十年后

translation.zh: 我得到了一个确凿的结论

translation.en: of, uh, the Israeli prosecution
translation.zh: 以色列的检控制度

translation.en: as a factory of travesty of justice.
translation.zh: 是司法界的一大笑话

translation.en: -[reporter] Are you innocent? -I'm an innocent man. I'm wrong man.
translation.zh: 你是无辜的吗？ 我是个无辜的老人

translation.en: [Sheftel] I heard about Ivan the Terrible
translation.zh: 在他从美国被引渡至以色列前

translation.en: before he was extradited from the US to Israel.
translation.zh: 我就已经听说了“伊凡雷帝”这号人物

translation.en: I was, uh, like any other Israeli,
translation.zh: 我当初的想法跟其他以色列人一样

translation.en: positively convinced that Ivan the Terrible is John Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: 非常确定约翰·德米扬鲁克 就是“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: I had no doubt whatsoever.
translation.zh: 毋庸置疑

translation.en: I started, I don't know why. Don't have any... any explanation why,
translation.zh: 不知道怎么了 也解释不出所以然来

translation.en: but I started to think about it almost every day.
translation.zh: 从那一刻起 几乎天天都在思考这个案子

translation.en: Looking for every piece of information
translation.zh: 我查看了所有从报纸、广播节目

translation.en: in any newspaper or radio or television whatsoever.
translation.zh: 电视节目等媒体获取的资料

translation.en: It occurred to me that the essence of the evidence against him...
translation.zh: 我发现针对当事人的关键证据

translation.en: may be very flawed.
translation.zh: 破绽百出

translation.en: The entire adventure...
translation.zh: 这整个诉讼案

translation.en: may be a shocking farce.
translation.zh: 搞不好是个令人震惊的闹剧

translation.en: I said to O'Connor, "I'm in the case.
translation.zh: 我告诉奥康诺：“我愿意加入

translation.zh: 当事人不是‘伊凡雷帝’”

translation.en: [Gabay] The first time that I saw Sheftel,
translation.zh: 第一次见到谢菲尔

translation.en: he embodied, for me, a traitor.
translation.zh: 他给我一个“叛国贼”的印象

translation.en: [Henry] I thought of Sheftel as being a showman at first.
translation.zh: 我起初以为 谢菲尔是个喜欢出风头的人

translation.en: A showboat, I should say.
translation.zh: 或是一个喜欢卖弄自己的人

translation.en: He was quite...
translation.zh: 他这个人…

translation.en: uh, larger than life.
translation.zh: 铺张浮夸

translation.en: [Klieger, in Hebrew] I can't tell you what I think about Sheftel,
translation.zh: 我不能把我对谢菲尔的想法告诉你

translation.en: because he'd sue me immediately.
translation.zh: 他知道后会马上控告我的

translation.en: But I'm sorry that there are Jews like Sheftel.
translation.zh: 我只能说 有谢菲尔这种犹太人 我感到抱歉

translation.en: I'm ashamed of it.
translation.zh: 我感到耻辱

translation.en: Yoram, let's say you're defending a murderer,
translation.zh: 尤拉姆 如今你成了 杀人凶手的辩护律师

translation.en: and for some reason or another,
translation.zh: 基于某些原因

translation.en: you can build him a stellar defense.
translation.zh: 你能为他建立有利的辩护条件

translation.en: Would you get him acquitted?
translation.zh: 你会设法让他洗清罪名吗？

translation.en: With enthusiasm.
translation.zh: 十分乐意

translation.en: [in English] A person is entitled to a defense. I understand.
translation.zh: 任何人都有权辩护 这点我理解

translation.en: I saw Sheftel's involvement
translation.zh: 看到谢菲尔加入辩护阵营

translation.en: such that he had a little bit too much of a relish to get Mr. Demjanjuk found not guilty.
translation.zh: 表现出一副协助德米扬鲁克洗清罪名 而欣然自喜的模样

translation.en: I have no respect for him.
translation.zh: 我对他毫无敬意可言

translation.en: None.
translation.zh: 没有丝毫尊敬

translation.en: [younger Henry] Reporters and photographers are arriving here daily.
translation.zh: 每天都有媒体记者飞抵这个地方

translation.en: Most are here for the duration of what they call the trial of the decade.
translation.zh: 大部分 以采访这起“世纪大审判”为目的

translation.en: [Henry] When this story came up
translation.zh: 这则新闻出炉后

translation.en: and I was assigned to get on an airplane to fly over to Jerusalem,
translation.zh: 我便坐上飞往耶路撒冷的班机 在当地执行采访工作

translation.en: I didn't know the true scope of the story
translation.zh: 我起初不太了解整件事的来龙去脉

translation.en: until I got there and saw the interest.
translation.zh: 抵达当地后 才意识到这起案件受关注的程度

translation.en: Everybody had a complete understanding of what the evidence was against this man,
translation.zh: 当地民众都对指控德米扬鲁克的证据 以致他的神情举止和一言一语 拥有深厚的了解

translation.en: from the way he looked, from the way he spoke.
translation.zh: 以致他的神情举止和一言一语 拥有深厚的了解

translation.en: You could tell their minds were pretty much made up.
translation.zh: 看得出他们对他的身份深信不疑

translation.en: If you ask me, I think he's guilty.
translation.zh: 如果你问我 我认为他有罪

translation.en: I think he is guilty.
translation.zh: 我认为他有罪

translation.en: If this guy is guilty, well, then, he's gotta pay the price.
translation.zh: 要是他真的有罪 就必须付出代价

translation.en: [Henry] Most people had a stronger opinion than I did.
translation.zh: 多数民众的想法比我更坚定

translation.en: That I can be sure of
translation.zh: 这点我非常确定

translation.en: 'cause they all said, "There's no doubt that he's guilty.
translation.zh: 毕竟他们都说： “毋庸置疑 这个人有罪

translation.en: It'll be over in a nanosecond."
translation.zh: 审讯很快就会结束”

translation.en: I don't think I have the capacity,
translation.zh: 我不敢十分确定

translation.en: 'cause somewhere in my mind is always the little nagging voice saying,
translation.zh: 因为在我脑海中的某个部位 有一个微弱的声音在隐隐作响

translation.en: "Are you sure you've got enough information?
translation.zh: “你们确定掌握了充分的证据吗？

translation.en: Are you sure you're not gonna be making a mistake?"
translation.zh: 你们确定不会出错吗？”

translation.en: And that's exactly how I felt in that courtroom in-- in Jerusalem.
translation.zh: 这就是我身在以色列期间的心声

translation.en: [reporter] The city of Jerusalem has been gearing up for the Demjanjuk trial for the past year,
translation.zh: 耶路撒冷市民 去年引颈常盼的德米扬鲁克案审理

translation.en: and finally, the trial is set to start here at the city's sprawling convention complex.
translation.zh: 今天终于在 该市壮观的会议中心掀开序幕

translation.en: When it starts, the trial will be conducted here under very tight security.
translation.zh: 审讯期间 建筑物周围保安森严

translation.en: Soldiers and police will be on duty everywhere,
translation.zh: 士兵和警察被安插在各个角落

translation.en: providing extraordinary protection during the entire length of the court case.
translation.zh: 加强整个审讯期间的保安工作

translation.en: The newspapers here are reporting the Demjanjuk case extensively.
translation.zh: 当地报纸大篇幅地报导 德米扬鲁克诉讼案

translation.en: Television has weighed the merits of the trial for months.
translation.zh: 电视台连续几个月 都在探讨这起诉讼案

translation.en: And soon, the actual court case begins.
translation.zh: 很快 此案终于正式开庭

translation.en: We're still confident that justice will be done,
translation.zh: 我们依然相信正义会得到伸张

translation.en: and my father will be exonerated. And there won't be another...
translation.zh: 我父亲将会被免罪 不再…

translation.en: crucifixion.
translation.zh: 受苦受难

translation.en: [reporter, in Hebrew] Where did you come from at this early hour?
translation.zh: 这么早就到了 你来自什么地方？

translation.en: Ramat Gan.
translation.zh: 我来自拉马特干

translation.en: -[reporter] Why? -Why?
translation.zh: -为什么？ -为什么？

translation.en: I told you. I lost them all.
translation.zh: 我说了 我失去了所有亲人

translation.en: [in English] The three-judge panel begins hearing the Demjanjuk case
translation.zh: 接下来两个小时内 三名法官将在这个法院中

translation.en: in this courtroom within the next two hours.
translation.zh: 接下来两个小时内 三名法官将在这个法院中 开始审理德米扬鲁克案

translation.en: [reporter 1, in Hebrew] Each visitor's personal details were logged,
translation.zh: 每个前来旁听的民众 都必须留下详细个人资料

translation.en: and metal objects caused the metal detector to buzz.
translation.zh: 凡是携带金属物品的人 都会触动金属探测警报器

translation.en: [reporter 2] What would you like the outcome to be?
translation.zh: 你希望看到怎样的审讯结果？

translation.en: I want him to hang.
translation.zh: 我希望他被吊死

translation.en: I'd hang him myself.
translation.zh: 不然我会亲自吊死他

translation.en: Or burn him.
translation.zh: 或是烧死他

translation.en: [reporter 1] A few minutes after 7:00,
translation.zh: 早上7点刚过

translation.en: two hours before the trial is set to begin,
translation.zh: 也就是开审前两个小时

translation.en: John Demjanjuk is brought in from Ayalon Prison.
translation.zh: 警方将羁押阿亚隆监狱的 约翰·德米扬鲁克送抵法庭

translation.en: [reporter 3, in English] The man Israelis say is the Butcher of Treblinka
translation.zh: 被以色列人 称为“特雷布林卡屠夫”的人

translation.en: went on trial in Jerusalem today.
translation.zh: 今日出庭受审

translation.en: [in Hebrew] The John Demjanjuk trial began today
translation.zh: 约翰·德利米扬鲁克诉讼案

translation.en: at the International Convention Center in Jerusalem.
translation.zh: 今日在耶路撒冷国际会议中心开审

translation.en: [reporter 4, in English] This is so much more than a trial of one man's guilt.
translation.zh: 这不是一起 将某个人治罪的普通诉讼案

translation.en: This is a hearing of history.
translation.zh: 而是一个具有历史意义的审讯

translation.en: When Eichmann was on trial,
translation.zh: 艾希曼受审时

translation.en: my mother made me watch it.
translation.zh: 我妈要我亲眼看见

translation.en: Now Demjanjuk is on trial, and I want my child to watch it.
translation.zh: 如今德米扬鲁克受审 我要我的孩子亲眼看见

translation.en: This is the only safeguard we have that it never happens again.
translation.zh: 唯有这么做 才能确保历史不会重演

translation.en: All the research I'd done, all, everything--
translation.zh: 我做了这么多的研究 所付出的一切

translation.en: This was the culmination of years and years.
translation.zh: 多年来的努力 等的就是这个关键时刻

translation.en: Here I am,
translation.zh: 我站在了法庭上

translation.en: one or two hours of sleep, going on adrenaline,
translation.zh: 每天只睡一、两个小时 肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: having to be ready.
translation.zh: 以做好准备

translation.en: [Sheftel] This is a case of...
translation.zh: 这起案件

translation.en: establishment atrocity from bottom to top.
translation.zh: 从头到尾都是一个有组织性的暴行

translation.en: A cover-up and a frame-up...
translation.zh: 是诡计 是诬陷

translation.en: in a show trial.
translation.zh: 是法庭作秀

translation.en: [Sheftel] I was hundred percent convinced
translation.zh: 我十分确定

translation.en: that Demjanjuk is not Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 德米扬鲁克不是“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: Yet, I'm convinced hundred percent
translation.zh: 我也十分确定

translation.en: that he would be found guilty and sentenced to death.
translation.zh: 他会被判有罪 并处以死刑

translation.en: But I was sure...
translation.zh: 不过我也相信

translation.en: that I would manage to destroy the show.
translation.zh: 我能摧毁整个作秀

translation.en: [in Hebrew] All rise!
translation.zh: 全体肃立！

translation.en: Case 3736, State of Israel vs. John Ivan Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: 第3736号案 原告为以色列政府 被告为约翰·伊凡德米扬鲁克

translation.en: The accused will rise.
translation.zh: 请被告起立

translation.en: -Please state your name. -Uh...
translation.zh: 请说出你的姓名

translation.en: [Levin] What's your name?
translation.zh: 请问你叫什么名字？

translation.en: [in Ukrainian] Honorable court, my name is John Demjanjuk.
translation.zh: 庭上 我叫约翰·德米扬鲁克

translation.en: [Levin, in Hebrew] I must warn you,
translation.zh: 我郑重警告你

translation.en: that you must tell the truth and the whole truth.
translation.zh: 你必须在审讯过程中说出实情 不得有半点虚假

translation.en: If you don't, you will be punished by law.
translation.zh: 否则将受到法律制裁

translation.en: [in English] John, you're being accused of being at Treblinka
translation.zh: 约翰 你被控在特雷布林卡集中营

translation.en: and participating in the horrendous crimes at that death killing camp.
translation.zh: 参与了惨无人道的犯罪行动

translation.en: Uh, would you tell the court, at this instance,
translation.zh: 这一刻 请你告诉法庭

translation.en: what your answer is with regard to you ever being at that location and perpetrating any of these crimes?
translation.zh: 你是否曾在上述地点作案？

translation.en: [in Ukrainian] The honorable bench,
translation.zh: 庭上

translation.en: I'm accused here of having been at Treblinka.
translation.zh: 这项控诉本人 在特雷布林卡犯案的指责

translation.en: This is not true.
translation.zh: 并不属实

translation.en: I was never either at Treblinka or Sobibor
translation.zh: 我既不曾在特雷布林卡 也不曾去过索比堡

translation.en: or at any other such place.
translation.zh: 或是此类地方

translation.en: Because I am not Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 因为我不是“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: And the most just witness to this is God himself.
translation.zh: 上帝是我最有力的证人

translation.en: I am innocent, innocent, innocent.
translation.zh: 我再三强调 我是无辜的

translation.en: [man, in English] I studied Demjanuk's character, Demjanjuk's reaction.
translation.zh: 我研究了德米扬鲁克的个性和反应

translation.en: I realized he will never confess.
translation.zh: 我意识到 这个人永远不会俯首认罪

translation.en: He would rather stay and maybe die
translation.zh: 他宁愿以一个父亲 一个爷爷的身份活着

translation.en: as the father and the grandfather
translation.zh: 他宁愿以一个父亲 一个爷爷的身份活着 甚至死去

translation.en: uh, that he was later on in Cleveland.
translation.zh: 就像他住在克利夫兰时的样子

translation.en: In every normal criminal case, you have a scene of crime.
translation.zh: 每一宗罪案 都有一个犯罪现场

translation.en: But the Nazis, they have burnt and destroyed most of the evidence.
translation.zh: 但纳粹已经烧毁了大部分罪证

translation.en: The same goes to eyewitnesses.
translation.zh: 那些目击者也难以幸免

translation.en: I mean, most of them were exterminated by the Germans.
translation.zh: 多数已经被德军灭口

translation.en: And yet, I have to lead this trial.
translation.zh: 我则被委以重任 作为这起诉讼案的主审法官

translation.en: [in Hebrew] The prosecution would like to invite Pinchas Epstein.
translation.zh: 检方要求 请出宾卡斯·艾普斯坦上庭供证

translation.en: [in English] This trial was filled with so much passion, so much pain, and so much history.
translation.zh: 这起诉讼案充满了 澎湃激烈的情绪、痛苦和历史记忆

translation.en: Survivors were dying every day.
translation.zh: 幸存者都在渐渐死去

translation.en: And this was a last glimpse and effort
translation.zh: 这是人们最后一次亲眼所见 尽最后一分力气

translation.en: to hear them, to put it in language, and to listen.
translation.zh: 去聆听和定义整件事

translation.en: [younger Shaked, in Hebrew] I would ask of you to start with your date of birth.
translation.zh: 请先说出你的出生日期

translation.en: I am Epstein Pinchas, son of Dov and Sara.
translation.zh: 我叫宾卡斯·艾普斯坦 是多夫和莎拉的儿子

translation.en: I was born in Czestochowa on March 3, 1925.
translation.zh: 于1925年3月3日 出生在琴斯托霍瓦

translation.en: I understand that, from the moment you arrived at the death camp,
translation.zh: 据我所知 当年你刚抵达集中营不久

translation.en: you were assigned to carry bodies from the gas chambers to the pits.
translation.zh: 就授命将毒气室内的尸体 搬运到坟坑处

translation.en: [Pinchas] Correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I sat at a spot where I could see
translation.zh: 我所坐的位置 可以清楚地看见

translation.en: the engine of the gas chambers.
translation.zh: 毒气室的发动机

translation.en: It was the machine house.
translation.zh: 毒气室也就是所谓的“机械房”

translation.en: And I saw a man come out of the gas chamber.
translation.zh: 我看见一个男人走出毒气室

translation.en: Later, I learned his name was Ivan. Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 后来我得知他叫伊凡 绰号叫“伊凡雷帝”

translation.en: I saw a large man, and he was operating the engine.
translation.zh: 我看见有个身材魁梧的男人 在操作发动机

translation.en: They ordered to open the doors and take out the corpses.
translation.zh: 他们命令我们把门打开 将尸体搬出去

translation.en: This Ivan would come out of the engine room
translation.zh: 接着这个叫伊凡的人走出机械房

translation.en: and beat us with his pipe.
translation.zh: 用手上的烟斗抽打我们

translation.en: Sometimes he would carry a sword.
translation.zh: 有时他手里会握着一把剑

translation.en: And he would crush skulls, cut ears, and torture the prisoners.
translation.zh: 他会击碎囚犯的头颅 砍下囚犯的耳朵 折磨他们

translation.en: It was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 惨绝人寰

translation.en: Your Honors, we took out corpses. It was horrific to see.
translation.zh: 法官阁下 我们负责搬运尸体 那些尸体惨不忍睹

translation.en: People with crushed faces, people with knife wounds,
translation.zh: 那些人面目全非、刀痕累累

translation.en: pregnant women stabbed in the gut, people with eyes poked out.
translation.zh: 有孕妇的腹部被刺穿 有人的眼睛被挖了出来

translation.en: There are no words.
translation.zh: 言语难以形容

translation.en: One day a living girl
translation.zh: 有一天 有个还活着的小女孩

translation.en: came out of the gas chambers.
translation.zh: 从毒气室里走出来

translation.en: About 12 years old.
translation.zh: 大概12岁左右

translation.en: Her words still ring in my ears:
translation.zh: 她的声音依然在我耳边响起…

translation.en: "Yachtse du mamoshy."
translation.zh: 她说：“Yachtse du mamoshy”

translation.en: -[Levin] What do these words mean? -[voice breaking] "I want my mommy."
translation.zh: -这句话是什么意思？ -“我要妈妈”

translation.en: [crying] I have a granddaughter her age.
translation.zh: 我有个孙女 就跟她一样大

translation.en: Then they took her to the pit and shot her.
translation.zh: 之后他们把她带到坟坑枪毙了

translation.en: Your Honors, I see Ivan every night. I want to...
translation.zh: 法官阁下 我每晚都会看见伊凡 我要…

translation.en: My poor wife. I dream of him every night. I see him every night.
translation.zh: 我可怜的夫人 我每晚都会梦见他 我每晚都会看见他

translation.en: He is engraved in my memory. I cannot escape him.
translation.zh: 他的模样深深烙刻在我记忆中 甩也甩不掉

translation.en: I see Ivan here, in front of me, as I remember him, as he lives in my mind.
translation.zh: 如今我看见伊凡就站在我面前 我记得他 他长得跟我记忆中一样

translation.en: There he is, as he stands here! Here he stands!
translation.zh: 他就在那边 他就站在庭上！ 他就站在这边！

translation.en: [Levin] Mr. Epstein!
translation.zh: 艾普斯坦先生！

translation.en: Age has taken its toll, it's obvious, but not as much as to not know the man.
translation.zh: 虽然他明显有了岁月的痕迹 但不至于令我认不出他

translation.en: I see him, I see him, I see him.
translation.zh: 我看到的人就是他…

translation.en: -[man] Murderer! -[Irene] Shh!
translation.zh: 杀人凶手！

translation.en: [Tal] Be seated!
translation.zh: 坐下！

translation.en: [Sheftel, in English] There is full entitlement to seek brutal...
translation.zh: 人们有绝对的权力

translation.en: merciless revenge from Ivan the Terrible.
translation.zh: 找“伊凡雷帝”报仇雪恨

translation.en: I see a lot of value in revenge against the proper person,
